name: 2DShooter (MeeTee)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project for the "Game Design and Development 1: 2D Shooter" course.

I have added the following modifications to the project:

  • Redesigned the UI pages (MainMenu and ingame ones)
  • Added the Instructions page with descriptions.
  • Added Mission Objective Description on each level
  • Created 4 levels with a connected storyline
  • Added a C# script to display the number of lives the player has left
  • Modified some enemy's health for story purposes

Created by:

Máté Szűcs
